articles.title: Dog found hidden in Picasso painting - Daily Mail
articles.description: Guggenheim conservators found a small dog hidden under layers of paint in a famed Picasso work currently on display in the famed New York City museum.
articles.content:
Conservators working with the Guggenheim Museum in New York have uncovered a small dog hidden beneath the painted surface of a Pablo Picasso painting.
